short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeps you on Teams always Available

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension that keeps you always available on the Teams web.

How it works:

All you need is to open the Teams in a separate active Chrome tab and activate the "Keep me always Available" option.

Then you can any time choose your desired status or reset your status through the Teams menu. The chosen status will be maintained.

If you change or reset your status on your mobile or other devices then the new status will be maintained and synchronized across your all devices.

You can create your customized schedule easily using the "Schedule" feature. The chosen statuses will go into effect on the time automatically.

Note: Use the extension at your own risk and exclusively with ethical intentions.
